sorry I tried to search the chat for 5944 and it seems that for Citi rewards we should be able to get 4mpd for 5944 transactions? but when I search the tncs 5944 doesn't seem to be inside. Is it because if I pair with amaze it will automatically qualify as a transaction eligible for 4mpd?
Amaze does not change the mcc code
You get 4mpd on CRMC for online transactions (except mobile wallet and travel-related). Amaze converts an offline transaction to an online one  hence you are able to get 4mpd.
